text: Gray Simons (born August 13, 1939) is an American wrestler. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. Simons was head coach at Lock Haven, Indiana State, Tennessee and Old Dominion. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United States Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Norfolk, Virginia
title: Gray Simons
